mapper.sql: SCHEME_FLOW, SCHEME_NAME, PROJ_TYPE_ID, PROJ_TYPE_NAME, EVALUATION_ID, EVALUATION_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.SRM_GRADE_SCHEME
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.SRM_GRADE_SCHEME (SCHEME_FLOW, SCHEME_NAME, PROJ_TYPE_ID, PROJ_TYPE_NAME, EVALUATION_ID, EVALUATION_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SCHEME_FLOW,
SCHEME_NAME,
PROJ_TYPE_ID,
PROJ_TYPE_NAME,
EVALUATION_ID,

RECORD_STATUS,

mapper.update:
update PDSCI.SRM_GRADE_SCHEME
SCHEME_FLOW = #{record.schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEME_NAME = #{record.schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_TYPE_ID = #{record.projTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_TYPE_NAME = #{record.projTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EVALUATION_NAME = #{record.evaluationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PDSCI.SRM_GRADE_SCHEME

PROJ_TYPE_ID = #{projTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_TYPE_NAME = #{projTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where SCHEME_FLOW = #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
